mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sharingList (brd_num, user_num, reg_date, state_lg, state_md, reject_msg, message) VALUES (#{brd_num}, #{user_num}, sysdate, 300,100,'', #{message})
mapper.select: SELECT b.brd_num, b.participants, u.nick, u.user_name, u.tel, u.addr, s.message, s.reg_date, s.user_num, b.applicants, s.state_md FROM sharingList s, user1 u, board b WHERE b. brd_num = #{brd_num} and s.brd_num = #{brd_num} AND s.user_num = u.user_num AND brd_lg = 700 AND brd_md = 102 AND brd_step = 0
